funFacts: Did you know? Developing this app costs approximately 178 cups of coffee per year!
For every hour of coding, an average of 2.4 snacks are consumed.
The number of bug fixes is directly proportional to the developer's coffee consumption.
This app was programmed with love, some magic and way too much caffeine.
Studies show: Happy developers create better apps. You're making me very happy right now!
